import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import React from 'react'; import { Button, Container, Nav, Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../App.css'; // Ensure this file contains your custom styles import esgIcon from '../assets/img/icon_esg.png'; import GreenTrendz from '../assets/img/logo1-2.png'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; import image from '../assets/img/hero_1.jpg'; const HomePage = () => { // Hero Section Styles const heroStyles = { height: '70vh', backgroundImage: "url('/hero-image.jpg')", // Replace with your hero image backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', color: 'white', }; return (
{/* Header with Navbar */}
Services About Us Contact
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Carousel Item 1 */}

Empower Your Business for a Sustainable Future

With GreenTrendz, turn your ESG goals into reality through intelligent data management and comprehensive reporting.

{/* Carousel Item 2 */}

Unleash the Power of Your Data to Visualize Your ESG Journey.

Design interactive dashboards that showcase your company’s sustainability achievements.

{/* Carousel Item 3 */}

Quantify Your Environmental Footprint

Monitor your carbon emissions and resource usage to drive sustainable practices.

{/* Carousel Item 4 */}

Build a Better Community Through Social Responsibility

Measure Your Social Contributions and Strengthen Corporate Responsibility

{/* Carousel Controls */}
{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

Your Partners in Growth and Development

{/* Service 1: ESG Reporting */}

ESG Reporting

Comprehensive ESG standards to ensure businesses are sustainable and responsible.

  • Environment, Social, Governance compliance
  • Stakeholder engagement
  • Risk and opportunity assessment
{/* Service 2: BRSR - SEBI Framework */}

BRSR - SEBI Framework

Aligning your reporting with SEBI’s BRSR framework for effective sustainability disclosures.

  • Governance, leadership, and accountability
  • Key performance indicators
  • Financial risk disclosure
{/* Service 3: GRI Reporting Framework */}

GRI Reporting Framework

Implementing the GRI standards to disclose sustainability impacts effectively.

  • Materiality assessment
  • Disclosure transparency
  • Performance tracking
{/* Service 4: PCAF - Carbon Accounting */}

PCAF - Carbon Accounting

Measuring and managing carbon emissions to meet climate goals using PCAF methodology.

  • Carbon footprint calculation
  • Emission reduction strategies
  • Alignment with global climate goals
{/* Service 5: Dashboard */}

Dashboard

Interactive data visualization tools for tracking sustainability metrics.

  • Real-time data analysis
  • Customizable KPIs and graphs
  • Cloud-based reporting
{/* About Us Section */}

About Us

Your dedicated partner in environmental and sustainability initiatives

Our Mission

At GreenTrendz, we help organizations make data-driven decisions to achieve their sustainability goals and create a more environmentally responsible world. We believe in leveraging advanced technology to make ESG reporting simple, transparent, and actionable.
{/* Contact Section */}

Contact Us

Get in touch with us to learn more about our services and solutions

Email: contact@greentrendz.com

Phone: +1 234 567 890

Address: 123 Sustainable Ave, Green City, USA
